content: The **Singapore Amateur Radio Transmitting Society** (**SARTS**) is a [non-profit organization](/wiki/Non-profit_organization) for [amateur radio](/wiki/Amateur_radio) enthusiasts in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## Background Founded on 26 August 1968, the organization's primary mission is to popularize and promote amateur radio in Singapore. SARTS sponsors [amateur radio operating awards](/wiki/Amateur_radio_operating_award) and operates special event [stations](/wiki/Amateur_radio_station) on a regular basis. SARTS is the member society representing Singapore in the [International Amateur Radio Union](/wiki/International_Amateur_Radio_Union). - [Malaysian Amateur Radio Transmitters' Society](/wiki/Malaysian_Amateur_Radio_Transmitters%27_Society) This Singaporean organisation article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about an organization related to [amateur radio](/wiki/Amateur_radio) is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore Amateur Radio Transmitting Society
